entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-08-29
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Cryptographic functions using OpenSSL fail in a container running on a Linux kernel with FIPS enabled #107164
  • Adding OpenTelemetry instrumentation results in 15% RPS degradation #107158
    10.0.0
  • [DependencyInjection] IServiceProvider GetService(s) behavior differences #107153
  • [API Proposal]: Add read/write span methods to UnmanagedMemoryAccessor #107148
  • JIT: Illegal instruction generated by JIT for `Avx512BW.VL.CompareLessThan` #107146
  • Improve error message for unexpected hardware exceptions in managed code with new EH #107145
  • Merge consecutive homogenous scalar RMW operations into their vector alternative #107143
  • Microsoft.Extensions.Hosting has a transitive vulnerability (System.Text.Json) #107141
  • Intended behavior of explicit IDisposable.Dispose implementations in ref structs. #107140
  • [profiler] It doesn't seem to be possible to get information about generic arguments of the defining class of a function from JIT compilation callbacks #107139
    10.0.0
  • JIT: Codegen/emitter disagreement about GC info with epilogs #107137
    10.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Add ToDateTimeOffset and TryToDateTimeOffset to System.Guid #107136
  • ARM64-SVE: Don't assume MOVPRFX #107134
    10.0.0
  • 使用 SmtpClient 发送带有附件的邮件 有一定几率会触发“操作已超时”错误 #107128
    Future
  • Chrome update action is failing #107125
    10.0.0
  • [mono crash] mono runtime is crashing when new an object and mono main thread is in STATE_Blocking #107122

Closed

  • Test failure: Interop/IJW/CopyConstructorMarshaler/CopyConstructorMarshaler/CopyConstructorMarshaler.cmd #106848
    10.0.0
  • `UnsafeAccessorAttribute` doesn't work with generic classes that have any constraint on generic type argument #107132
    10.0.0
  • ILLink keeps members of pointer/byref types for DynamicallyAccessedMembers #106214
    10.0.0
  • Incorrect result computed for tensor slices #106280
    9.0.0
  • Versions of third-party-libraries (libpng16.dll , pcre2-8-0.dll & openssl.dll) used by dotnet runtime. #107001
  • `Console.ReadKey()` returning an empty `ConsoleKeyInfo.Key` for most keys. #107157
  • [x86/Linux] CI support for build using docker #7538
  • JIT: Assertion failed 'unreached' during `Importation` #106372
    9.0.0
  • Port System.Collections docs for .NET 9 APIs #105976
    9.0.0
  • Port System.Linq docs for .NET 9 APIs #105984
    9.0.0
  • AppHost.Bundle.Tests.BundledAppWithSubDirs.FrameworkDependent(options: None) failed in CI #103743
    10.0.0
  • [WASI] implement finalizer #107071
    10.0.0
  • DateTime AddUnits & TimeSpan IntervalFromDoubleTicks rounding issues at the factionalPart level #107129
    Future
  • Generic attributes lack testing #73735
    10.0.0
  • SslStream intermittently returns zero byte read mid-stream in net8.0 #107051
  • [MacCatalyst] Using LINQ Sum in a property getter make release binary crash #106936
  • System.Resources.Extensions.Tests.FormattedObject.BasicObjectTests.BasicObjectsRoundTripAndMatch failure #104905
    10.0.0
  • [mono][Perf] System.Tests.Perf_Type.GetType_Resolvers regression on 4/24/2024 9:24:37 PM #106402
    9.0.0
  • [Perf] Windows/x64: 1 Regression on 8/13/2024 5:29:08 PM #106709
    Future
  • Behavior change in NullabilityInfoContext between .NET 8 and .NET 9 #106636
    Future
  • JsonSerializerOptions.RespectRequiredConstructorParameters still calls constructor with invalid values #107065
    9.0.0
  • [browser][MT] JSMarshalerArgument.ToJSContext crashes with "ContextHandle not set" #102749
    10.0.0
  • Installed SDK is not found #1374
  • Zombie thread created by System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection #75614
  • [API Proposal]: Interportability between Diagnostics.TraceLevel and Diagnostics.SourceLevels #92004
  • Blazor WASM not aborting socket on HttpClient cancellation #93930

PullRequests

Created

  • Put brotli on the FetchContent plan #107166
    area-System.IO.Compression, 10.0.0
  • ARM-SVE: Fix validation logic for `GatherVectorByteOffsetFirstFaulting` tests #107165
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Disable MemoryStream_SeekOverflow_Throws on Linux #107163
    area-System.IO
  • [WASI] fix response header conversion and event loop #107162
    area-System.Net.Http, community-contribution
  • Reduce net core app current package dependencies #107161
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [release/9.0] Use the typical `MethodTable` not instantiated on the declaration for constraint validation #107160
    Servicing-approved, area-VM-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • [wasm] Add missing .npmrc #107159
    area-Build-mono
  • Make missing framework error message list other architectures that were found #107156
    area-Host
  • Perf: Fix Shake on Windows performing a double reset #107155
    area-System.Security, cryptographic-docs-impact
  • Remove helper method frame from Profiler hooks #107152
    needs-area-label
  • Enable xUnit verbose logging on System.IO.Tests #107149
    NO-MERGE, area-System.IO
  • [release/9.0] Ensure that Vector128.CreateSequence works on x86 for non-constant 64-bit inputs #107147
    Servicing-approved, area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Update size of LDAP `BerVal.bv_len` struct on unix #107142
    area-System.DirectoryServices, 10.0.0
  • [wasm] Add option for both .NET 8 & 9 in current templates #107135
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 10.0.0
  • SPMI: Always enable venv for coreclr_tests.run collection #107133
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix chrome update action is failing #107131
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • [LoongArch64] Add 'loongarch64' display in Crossgen2 and ILC cli. #107130
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Remove ActiveIssue for resolved issues in Vector tests #107127
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • [release/9.0] Ensure required properties are validated before invoking the deserialization constructor. #107126
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Text.Json, 9.0.0
  • JIT: fix some asserts that arise when debugging with checked build #107121
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/9.0] Increase timeout for SendMoreThanStreamLimitRequestsConcurrently_LastWaits test #107120
    area-System.Net.Http

Merged

  • Disable test that validates specific copy constructor counts on JitStress #106987
    area-Interop-coreclr
  • Use the typical `MethodTable` not instantiated on the declaration for constraint validation #107154
    area-System.Runtime.CompilerServices, 10.0.0
  • [release/9.0] Azure Linux 3.0 and test fixes #107123
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Security, test-enhancement, 9.0.0
  • Update branding to 8.0.10 #107151
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries, 8.0.10
  • Don't keep members of pointer or byref element types #106215
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Update branding to 6.0.35 #107150
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries, 6.0.35
  • Fix libraries fuzzing pipeline #107048
    needs-area-label, 10.0.0
  • [release/9.0] Tensor Operation fixes when input is sliced (non-contiguous) #107097
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Numerics.Tensors, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Tensor Operation fixes when input is sliced (non-contiguous) #106985
    area-System.Numerics.Tensors, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Fix DotnetFuzzing.sln #107144
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, 10.0.0
  • Remove `BaseDomain::CreateSizedRefHandle` #107106
    area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr
  • Remove unused custom marshaler code and move ICustomMarshaler and Color marshalling handling to managed code #106735
    area-Interop-coreclr
  • Define a merged runner for the nativeaot subtree and run every test out-of-proc and don't reference the xunit generator #107002
    test-enhancement, area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • Fix up docs #106563
    area-Meta
  • Ensure that Vector128.CreateSequence works on x86 for non-constant 64-bit inputs #107053
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Remove ArrayClass::m_ElementType - get type from the type handle on MethodTable #106787
    area-TypeSystem-coreclr
  • Add Azure 3.0 helix test #106330
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Fix RidAssetResolution test to open shared framework file with read share access #107112
    area-Host
  • Add missing System.Collections and System.Linq API docs. #107138
    area-System.Collections
  • [release/9.0] Ensure that AdvSimd.Insert doesn't zero out the upper bits #107089
    Servicing-approved, area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [JIT] Allow side-effects for the first test in switch recognition #106988
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Convert stream override checks to `QCall` #107117
    area-VM-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • [release/9.0] Fix storage of stack trace of exception from reflection #107093
    Servicing-approved, area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • [release/9.0] Ensure the layout of `StackAllocatedBox<T>` matches boxed layouts #107075
    Servicing-approved, area-VM-coreclr
  • [WASI] finalizer + HTTP client child resources #107096
    arch-wasm, area-GC-mono, os-wasi, 10.0.0
  • Added additional tests for generic attributes. #106745
    area-System.Reflection, community-contribution
  • Don't use WeakReferences in the BF round trip test #106967
    area-System.Resources, test-enhancement, 10.0.0
  • JIT: Use `ValueTuple` argument for SIMD type lookup for `AdvSimd.Store*` #107099
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Update System.Net.* unit tests to react to SYSLIB0057 obsoletion #104487
    area-System.Net, test-enhancement
  • Add lld in dependency script #106913
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • SPMI: Add a public test version of the superpmi-collect pipeline #106960
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Update docs about units for SizeLimit #107101
    area-Extensions-Caching
  • [wasi][windows] Enable the wasi-aot-library tests on windows #107124
    area-Build-mono
  • Ensure required properties are validated before invoking the deserialization constructor. #107083
    area-System.Text.Json, 10.0.0
  • Remove Helper Method Frames from debugdebugger #107058
    area-VM-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • Change BuildWithFactoryReadDirect to not use RSA+MD5 #107119
    area-System.Security, test-enhancement
  • [release/9.0] pal init: Move InitializeFlushProcessWriteBuffers() after VIRTUALInitialize() #107114
    Servicing-approved, area-PAL-coreclr
  • [release/9.0] Extend timeout when waiting for service status #107109
    Servicing-approved, area-Extensions-Hosting
  • [release/9.0] Use OpenSSL 3's HKDF if it is available #107085
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Security, cryptographic-docs-impact, 9.0.0

Updated

  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2527058 #105829
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, linkable-framework
  • SuperPMI: ASPNET Collection job #106844
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Correct lengths of Chinese lunisolar calendar months 8 and 9 in 2057. #107038
    area-System.Globalization, community-contribution, 10.0.0
  • Update the CPUID and XSAVE logics for APX #104637
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • JIT: Skip more covariance checks #107116
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add GC heap hard limit for 32 bit #101024
    area-GC-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [browser][mono] Heap snapshot system for WASM #105713
    arch-wasm, area-Diagnostics-mono
  • Split identifier calculation from code context and bind marshallers to the code context #106846
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator
  • [release/8.0-staging] Do not allow a non-keyed service to be injected to a keyed parameter #106877
    Servicing-approved, area-Extensions-DependencyInjection, 8.0.10
  • [release/8.0-staging] Return null instead of throwing in ServiceDescriptor.ImplementationInstance\Type\Factory if a keyed service #106841
    Servicing-approved, area-Extensions-DependencyInjection, 8.0.10
  • Add draft of runtime async ECMA-335 changes #104063
    area-Meta
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0' => 'release/8.0-staging' #106340
    Servicing-approved, area-codeflow
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'release/6.0-staging' #106341
    Servicing-approved, area-codeflow
  • NativeAOT the XUnitLogChecker #103795
    area-Infrastructure
  • Use TestExclusionList in bringup_runtest.sh #106201
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Use merged runners for ios tests #107118
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Use live apphost when publishing ilc as singlefile #105004
    os-freebsd, community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fix calling property setter In in the Configuration source generator #107057
    area-Extensions-Configuration
  • [release/8.0-staging] Backport Azure Linux test changes #107061
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Security, 8.0.10
  • [release/8.0-staging][infra][android] Fix Android helix queue name #107023
    Servicing-approved, os-android, area-Infrastructure-mono, 8.0.10
  • [release/8.0-staging] Fix copying ephemeral keys to keychains #107041
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Security, 8.0.10
  • [release/6.0-staging] Fix copying ephemeral keys to keychains #107046
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Security, 6.0.34
  • [TypeName] Nested types should respect MaxNode count #106334
    area-System.Reflection.Metadata, binaryformatter-migration, 9.0.0
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2526906 #106995
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [WASI] sockets #106977
    arch-wasm, area-System.Net.Sockets, os-wasi, 10.0.0
  • Upgrade zlib-ng to 2.2.1 #105771
    area-System.IO.Compression
  • ARM64-SVE: Delay free all ops within conditional select #107036
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [browser] Fix processing of satellite assemblies from referenced assembly during publish #106696
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 10.0.0
  • Provide System.Composition.TypedParts package readme #106785
    area-System.Composition, community-contribution
  • BinaryFormatter tests should be skipped only on AOT, WASM and Mobile #106858
    area-System.Runtime, test-enhancement, binaryformatter-migration
  • [mono][tvos] Do not treat assembly.pdb/xml files as native files to bundle when AOTing on Helix #107079
    area-Infrastructure-mono, os-tvos
  • [wasm] Clean emsdk setup #106403
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • [wasm] Handle exceptional cases when looking up unmanaged delegates #107113
    area-Interop-mono
  • JIT: Give `Compiler` a proper constructor #107098
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [RISC-V] Fix Int32 to Unsigned overflow check #107024
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Revert Revert "Copy published crossgen2 in artifacts/tests (#80154)" #106965
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Target .NET 10 / net10.0 #106599
    area-Infrastructure
  • Introducing new event for failed http requests #106284 #106964
    area-Extensions-HttpClientFactory, community-contribution
  • [release/9.0][no-merge][testing][Android] Run runtime and libraries tests on different Android API version #106951
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, os-android, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Bump to updated llvm 19 #105427
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [release/9.0] Disable NoCallback_RevokedCertificate_NoRevocationChecking_Succeeds test on Alpine #107035
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Net.Http, test-bug, 9.0.0
  • Let the debugger knows DATAS is on #107115
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Respect JitEnableOptionalRelocs in TryReserveInitialMemory #107059
    area-PAL-coreclr
